A short story about a cloud that overcomes its fear of heights by facing a particularly tall mountain and finding strength in the journey.
A poem that uses metaphors to describe the fear of heights and how it can be overcome.
A piece of art that depicts a cloud hovering over a tall mountain, with a message of encouragement for those facing their own fears.
A game that simulates the experience of flying over mountains and helps players overcome their fear of heights.
